sentences.en: West Berlin always had a large anarchist community.
sentences.cn: 西柏林一直存在一个大的无政府主义群体。

sentences.en: He was apparently quite converted from his anarchist views.
sentences.cn: 他显然已经从他的无政府主义观点大大地转变了。

sentences.en: She set up her stand to recruit students to the Anarchist Association.
sentences.cn: 她搭了一个摊位招募学生加入无政府主义者协会。
